info.name: Dark Dogecharts
info.description: Dark style for dogecharts.org. Currently does not work with my "Better Dogecharts" series, use the configure button in the upper right-hand corner to specify the exchanges! You like what you see? Feel free to donate Doge to DUBpWD1yCeoRNwQFyJzY8jCV77EDViNVFK You have a suggestion? PM me here or at freenode irc
info.additionalInfo:
v0.1.1 - Changed the even table lines to a darker grey
v0.1.2 - Background of new menu changed to black
